Text.Value: I'm not afraid of that hag.
*Flee, you feel it cry.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>

Text.Value: *You see the hag, eyes bright with glee, as she sets fire to the door.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of the hag, laughing as she throws back her head, the door engulfed in flames
EditorData.VFXTags: Door set on fire / fire spell?

Text.Value: *You feel the barest hint of life from within the door.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>

Text.Value: *His cries for mercy are cut short as the hag slices into him, dismembering him painstakingly, limb by limb.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Hag dismembers Theif on floor (cuts off limbs)
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cut scene: He's crying - shaking his head - back away clearly terrified. Shot of the hag - talons out appraoching him . Silohuette shot of her diving her claws down - ripping sounds.
EditorData.CinematicObjects: Weapon for hag to cut off Thief limbs / Thief limbs
EditorData.SFXTags: Door character (theif) cries for mercy then in pain as he is cut up
EditorData.VFXTags: Thief (door in human form) sliced up and limbs removed / Blood spray and splatter / Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: *Its form flickers, and you realise that the door is transparent.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The coloured sheen from the masks (when you wear them) passes over the doors
EditorData.VFXTags: Door transparency shimmers

Text.Value: If you let me through, I will do all I can to free you from your torment - I swear it.
All right, is there another way in?
*Images flash: a man cowering, a bag open at his feet. Gold coins spilling onto the floor.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: Thief cowering on floor pleaing for mercy from approaching Hag - Martin K
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cue cut scene: a shot of a man cowering, terrified on the ground. A bag of coins - open and spilled out on the ground.
EditorData.CinematicObjects: Open bag of gold coins with some spilled on floor
EditorData.VFXTags: Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: *The door stays silent.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>

Text.Value: *You feel crushing waves of fear as the presence within the door recoils. It can't let people through. Not again!*

EditorData.AnimationTags: {ChadD}-Player pressing a hand to their head as waves of fear hit them
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Just a shot of the player and the door - no visions yet. Player pressing a hand to their head as waves of fear hit them.
EditorData.logicalname: SelectSpeaker with same text as following Greeting

Text.Value: *It remains firmly closed as the presence huddles within.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of player glaring at door

Text.Value: *You feel a touch of the hag's magic, but whatever this door once held is gone.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: The hag is dead, and the player never knew that it was alive in the past.

Text.Value: Leave.
*You see an image of blue skies and sunshine as the door shudders a warning - run.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of blue sky - sunshine. A happy forest scene.
EditorData.VFXTags: Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: *Frustrated, the door rattles. You see the hag and... yourself?*

EditorData.AnimationTags: {ChadD}-[DUPE] (next node) player lying on ground injured anticipating Hag attack (bite)
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot as if through the player's eyes. Perspective from the ground looking up - seeing the hag looking down at you - smiling
EditorData.VFXTags: Future vision FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: No time to chat. I'm here to kill the hag.
*Weapons brandished, they charge into the hag's lair.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The charge forward - deeper into the lair
EditorData.VFXTags: Devine Glow on 3 characters / Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: *With a jerk, you're pulled from the vision. The presence within shrinks - begging you not to run through it.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: {ChadD}-Shot of player - touching their head in confusion
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of player - touching their head in confusion

Text.Value: Come on, open up!
*You see the hag. She walks through the door - its form shimmering.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of door shimmering in coloured sheen (like mask effect) and hag walking through it
EditorData.SFXTags: Magic as door flickers transparent as Hag walks through
EditorData.VFXTags: Door transparency shimmers as Hag walks through

Text.Value: *The presence within cowers - terrified of you.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>

Text.Value: *The lightest touch of hope brushes your mind as the presence within retreats.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>

Text.Value: *You lay bleeding as she leans over you - a smile on her face.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: player lying on ground injured anticipating Hag attack, Hag standing over preparing to bite Player on ground
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ibid
EditorData.SFXTags: player groans from injury and anticipated hag attack
EditorData.VFXTags: Blood puddle on ground / Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: *You see the hag. She walks through the door, its form shimmering.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of door shimmering in coloured sheen (like mask effect) and hag walking through it
EditorData.SFXTags: Magic as door flickers transparent as Hag walks through
EditorData.VFXTags: Door transparency shimmers as Hag walks through / Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: *You see the gallery, its walls lined with the hag's victims - their bodies and minds twisted beyond ruin.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of the gallery - the huddled victim in the mirror, the headless victim, the vacant bleeding eyes sockets
EditorData.CinematicObjects: Hag's victims (for set dressing if not part of enviroment)
EditorData.VFXTags: Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: *With a jerk, you're pulled from the vision. You feel the presence within shrink - terrified.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>
EditorData.VFXTags: Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special - fades away

Text.Value: I will strike the hag down with the full force of my fury - I swear it.
If I kill the hag, you'll be free.
*A scene appears in your mind: two paladins and a cleric marching through the door - shrouded in the glow of the divine.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: 3 characters through same doorway, determined march drawing weapons
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cut scene - two paladins and a cleric walking in the area after the door, cleric hands at the ready to cast a spelll, one paladin with a two handed sword out, the other with a shield and mace - moving forward
EditorData.VFXTags: Devine Glow on 3 characters / Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: *Her teeth, a row of deadly needles, shine as they dive into your throat, blood spraying.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: player lying on ground injured, Hag standing over attacks biting him viciously on throat
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Her mouth opens as she laughs and she dives towards you - shot of blood spraying into the air/onto the ground
EditorData.SFXTags: Vicious Biting throat with blood spray/ spilling
EditorData.VFXTags: Blood spray / Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: *The door twitches but stays firm.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>

Text.Value: You let them in? Naughty. That's a decade for each. You're mine for thirty more years, petal.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of hag's feet as she walks towards the door, camera on her face covered in blood as she smiles at the door
EditorData.NodeContext: Full hag mode - you've just murdered three people in cold blood;. You approach the person who let them in, taunting them and being cruel.
EditorData.VFXTags: Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special / Hag casts curse spell on door

Text.Value: *The presence within sobs. The hag is gone. He's trapped in this door, this wooden prison - forever.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: The hag is dead, and the player saw that it was alive in the past.

Text.Value: *Fear rushes through you as the door shakes, remembering the hag's smile.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of door - maybe a rattling sound?
EditorData.SFXTags: Wooden door shudder / subtle Hag chuckle
EditorData.VFXTags: Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: *She cackles. The man's remaining flesh twisted and contorted...*

EditorData.AnimationTags: {ChadD}-hag laughing as she raising her hands - vines erupt from the man's body - twisting upwards
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot - hag laughing as she raising her hands - vines erupt from the man's body - twisting upwards
EditorData.SFXTags: Hag Cackle (laugh) / near daed moans of Thiief / magic turning flesh into wood
EditorData.VFXTags: Remains of theif's body begining to transform into wooden door / Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: I have to get through. Now.
*The door shudders, imagining its wooden frame cracking and splintering in a raging inferno.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shot of the door burning in fire - you hear a man's scream
EditorData.SFXTags: Wooden door shudder / background sound of intense fire and splintering wood
EditorData.VFXTags: Flashes of raging fire on door / Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: Are you going to open up or not?
*You feel the barest touch of magic, wild and chaotic, beneath the twisted surface of the door.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: The hag didn't flee to her lair.

Text.Value: I mean it. Let me through.
I can see through you. I can just walk right in.
*...becoming the twisted surface of the door before you.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ibid
EditorData.SFXTags: finishing sound of magic turning flesh into wood
EditorData.VFXTags: Remains of theif's body completeing transformation into wooden door / Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: What happened last time you opened?
*You feel crushing waves of fear as a presence within the door recoils. It can't let people through. Not again!*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [DUPE] {ChadD}-Player pressing a hand to their head as waves of fear hit them
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Just a shot of the player and the door - no visions yet. Player pressing a hand to their head as waves of fear hit them.

Text.Value: Open up, or I'll burn you to ashes.
Not happening. The hag will die first - count on it.
*The door remains firmly closed as the presence shrinks, twisting with fear and despair.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>

Text.Value: Leave.
*Screams of terror pierce the air.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Screams, sounds of flesh tearing and the hag laughing
EditorData.VFXTags: Flashback FX - FX_MindRead_Spell_Special

Text.Value: ROAR.
Open. Now.
*The door trembles at the thought of the hag. She would be furious if she caught intruders here.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>

Text.Value: The hag will be the least of your problems if you don't open up.
The hag is perversion of nature, and I am sworn to strike her down - you have nothing to fear from me.
*You feel a whisper of thanks as the door's prisoner fades away.*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: <placeholder>
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: The hag is dead, and the player saw that it was alive in the past.

Synopsis:
The door guarding the entrance to the hag's lair. It's actually transparent and the player can walk through it. It's a cut scene as the door tries to project images onto the player and communicate to them. Pleading with them to leave. The door was a thief that was taken by Ethel and torn to shreds, with the remainder of his body transformed into a door.

Much of this is a 'cut scene' as the door projects visions into the player's mind instead of communicating.
